mapper.select: SELECT calendar_key, title, writer, to_char(start1, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"') start1, to_char(end1, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"') end1, detail, backgroundColor, textColor, allday, url FROM calendar WHERE project_key = 'PJ-0'
mapper.update: UPDATE CALENDAR SET title = #{title}, start1 = to_date(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"'), end1 = to_date(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"+09:00"'), detail = #{detail}, writer = #{writer}, backgroundColor = #{backgroundColor}, textColor = #{textColor}, allDay = #{allDay}, url = #{urlLink} WHERE calendar_key = #{calendar_key}
